name: If it fits it sits
description:
This game was developed as part of the "One Game per Week" seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences in Hamburg.  With a new topic  every week, Game Design Students develop a prototype-like game to improve their GameDev skills by coming up with quick solutions with minimal resources.

The given topic for this project : "Physics".

Game Description  

If it fits it sits is an arcady puzzlegame about collecting as many block shaped cats as you can! The local animal shelter has a special offer for cat lovers this weekend- you get 60 seconds to collect as many cats as you can! They just have too many.. maybe you can give them a new loving home?

Key Features

  • Grab a box and collect as many cats in 60 seconds
  • Discover 10 different tokes, all with their unique and funny designs
  • Try to beat your highscore with every new game

Credits

  • Ditzie Doodle
  • Lots of Coding help from Stefan@DigitalPenguin
  • Funny Background music intrumental by mr. AudioAgent
  • Funny Background music - Funny Jazz Song by mr.Audio Agent
  • All Sound effects are from freesound.org
